name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IdeaCam: Multi Screenshots to One Image YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take screenshots of any YouTube video with one click. Download or copy the stitched image.
